history.proof: intros P H_init H_step st tr H_star. induction H_star. - apply H_init. - shelve.

ctx: intros P H_init H_step st tr H_star.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat P : network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop x : network H_init : P x [] H_step : forall (st st' : network) (tr ev : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star x st tr -> P st tr -> step_async st st' ev -> P st' (tr ++ ev) x', x'' : network cs, cs' : list (name * (input + list output)) H : step_async x x' cs H_star : refl_trans_1n_trace step_async x' x'' cs' IHH_star : P x' [] -> (forall (st st' : network) (tr ev : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star x' st tr -> P st tr -> step_async st st' ev -> P st' (tr ++ ev)) -> P x'' cs' Unable to unify "step_async x x' cs" with "P x'' (cs ++ cs')".

ctx: intros P H_init H_step st tr H_star.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat P : network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop x : network H_init : P x [] H_step : forall (st st' : network) (tr ev : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star x st tr -> P st tr -> step_async st st' ev -> P st' (tr ++ ev) x', x'' : network cs, cs' : list (name * (input + list output)) H : step_async x x' cs H_star : refl_trans_1n_trace step_async x' x'' cs' IHH_star : P x' [] -> (forall (st st' : network) (tr ev : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star x' st tr -> P st tr -> step_async st st' ev -> P st' (tr ++ ev)) -> P x'' cs' Unable to unify "P x'' cs'" with "P x'' (cs ++ cs')".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall P : network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, P step_async_init [] -> (forall (st st' : network) (tr ev : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init st tr -> P st tr -> step_async st st' ev -> P st' (tr ++ ev)) -> forall (st : network) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star step_async_init st tr -> P st tr

Premises:
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
step_async_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_async : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) Arguments step_async_star {P params}
Inductive step_async (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation network (name * (input + list output)) := StepAsync_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_async net net' [(pDst p, inr out)] | StepAsync_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : network) (out : list output
step_async_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => {| nwPackets := []; nwState := init_handlers |} : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network Arguments step_async_init {P params}
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
ServerNetHandler_cases : forall (src : Name) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ServerNetHandler src m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> out = [] /\ ((exists c : Client_index, src = Client c /\ m = Lock /\ queue st' = queue st ++ [c] /\ (queue st = [] /\ ms = [(Client c, Locked)] \/ queue st <> [] /\ ms = [])) \/ m = Unlock /\ queue st' = List.tl (queue st) /\ (queue st' = [] /\ ms = [] \/ (exists (next : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue st' = next :: t /\ ms = [(Client next, Locked)])) \/ ms = [] /\ st' = st /\ m <> Unlock)

lb_step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> label -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p l p0 l0
lb_step_ordered_dynamic_ind : forall P : ordered_dynamic_network -> label -> ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P o l o0 l0
step_async_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l

ClientNetHandler_cases : forall (c : Client_index) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ClientNetHandler c m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> ms = [] /\ (st' = st /\ out = [] /\ m <> Locked \/ m = Locked /\ out = [Locked] /\ held st' = true)
